overview: Never take sandwiches from strangers - this seems to be the moral of Seduction of the Innocents, for this is precisely how the protagonist-narrator starts to go wrong: she accepts half a baloney sandwich from a weirdo on the street. "I was kind of embarrassed when he lifted up my skirt," she tells us, but the stranger doesnâ€™t stop there...
title: Seduction of the Innocents
